lines.setup: Ranek summoned me to the bridge under the pretext of a little stargazing. What he really wanted was to use my face as a tongue depressor!
lines.move_on_to_next_episode: Congratulations! You may now move on to the next episode.
lines.responding_to_nothing_on_replicator_plat: I do not detect any nutritional biomatter.
lines.responding_to_replicator_creation_failur: This is not what I requested.
lines.fix_replicator_request: I request that you repair yourself.
